data.name: AcademicExam
data.value: Two periodical exams will be held annually: (a) First temporal (b) Second temp. Weekly and other examinations will be held in 'Jami'ah' prescribed rules. There should be 80% presence in the examination. Can not attend the examination without the entrance test. Must be present at the examination for 10 minutes before the start of the test. Any disciplinary action may be taken including the expulsion for irregularities in the examination. Conducting mischief in the examination would be considered inadequate. If no one fails, then the next category will not be passed. If the student fails to apologize to the absence of the examination, the student will be expelled.

data.name: DressCode
data.value: Classroom Clothing: Jami'ah's Punjabi and Pajamas determined. White hat of yarn Residential Hall Clothing: Any type of lungi and loosely dresses. Huff or flower shovel ginger. Ashlon is prohibited by any dress.

data.name: GalleryDetails
data.value: Jami'ah's education course is divided into 4 levels Ibtaydayi or primary = 5 years Mutwasasitah or secondary = 5 years Chanubia or Higher Secondary = 2 years Fazilat (dora) or higher = 3 years

data.name: JamiyahLifeDetails
data.value: Studying in the light of its own syllabus determined in the form of advanced syllabus of local and foreign institutions. Directed by a handful of skilled, experienced, hardworking and dedicated teachers from various universities and universities of the country and abroad. If you are resident then always supervised by the teachers. A daily meal of 3 'daily' food as well as vegetarian and vegetarian food. Along with attaining full proficiency in Arabic and English language, there is also a chance to gain profound knowledge on the Qur'an and hadeeth. Open playground for healthy living and bodybuilding. Arsenic free pure water system through deep tube wells. Full power supply Computer training arrangements for students passed in the specified classes. Library rich in Bengali, English and Arabic books. The arrangement of 'Supervisory Study Program' as an alternative to class-next coaching. Operation of co-curriculum for the development of in-depth intellectuals. Arrange separate training for communication and lecturing skills in Arabic and English. Every year Jami'ah's academic calendar will be prepared and compiled by making a lesson plan. Healthy, beautiful and quality residential accommodation. Quran system of purely Quran and Hufaz Special care for the closing, JDC, Dakhil, Alim examination Present lectures and debate competition organized. Separate caretaker for unskilled students Prevalent politics free environment. Regular sports, cultural activities and education system. The primary treatment system for all students.

data.name: OurMadrasha
data.value: 'Shaykh Abdur Razzaq bin Yusuf' 'To spread the teachings of Quran and Saheeh hadeeth on the soil of Bangladesh on 24th August 2013, in the Rupganj, Narayanganj, and in February 2016, in Rajshahi,' Al-Jami'ah as-Salafiyah ', two simultaneous standard Islamic teachings The organization was established. Falilahil Hamd

data.name: OurSuccess
data.value: Within a year of the establishment of Jami'ah Salafiyah, with the help of the great God, we have been able to construct residential buildings of three-storeyed students, which have 10 rooms with 18/20 feet below the floor. And 4 rooms of 15/20 feet brick walls have been built for the students. Falilahil Hamd At present, there are 118 students, 10 teachers, four employees and 31 students, 5 teachers and 1 staff in the department of students in this organization. In the first year of his establishment, Jami'ah Salafiyya achieved 100% success in achieving 100% A Plus in the closing examination of the 5th grade. Presently Darshan Bukhari open to everyone in this organization is being held regularly for every month. Falilahil Hamd

data.name: ParentalResponsiblity
data.value: Parents should keep track of the child's education and pay monthly fees payable in due time. Parents should inform any complaint to the office along with the complaint and their good advice will be accepted in the interest of the organization's development. Parents will not be able to meet the child or contact the phone without the scheduled time. Parents can not stay in the students room. Encourage the students to comply with the rules of the organization. After the quarterly and temporary examination, the attendance meeting of the guardian is desirable.

data.name: ParentalResponsiblityHeading
data.value: Parents are responsible for the responsibility

data.name: Principal
data.value:
Born: Sheikh Abdur Razzak Bin Yusuf was born in a religious family of Hajirtala village under Maunga box under Devinagar upazila of Chapainawabganj district of northern Bangladesh.
Studying: After studying Maktab in the field of education, he read from Nawabganj Nawabganj Madrasa, one of the books of Hadith, Mishkat Sharif. Then he went to India hoping for higher education and finished Daura Hadith from Darul Ulum Maunathwangan in Uttar Pradesh. He ended the two-day tradition of Dora. Then he returned to the country and took part in the Fazil and Kamil examinations. He passed Kamil in 1st Division with hadith and tafsir.
He started his career by working as a teacher in Al-Marakazul Islami in Jannatpur, Gobindaganj, Gaibandha. Then since 1998, Al-Makarajul Islami As Salafi Noadapara has been serving as a Muhaddis in Rajshahi. He has also served as head teacher in Madras for nearly 5 years. In these five years Madrasah has kept a great deal of success in improving the answer. Besides, he also served as a member of the fatwa board of the monthly At Tahir. At present, he is also managing an organization named Al Jamiatus Salafia.
Din Khidmat: As a student, he used to give a speech from the life of the people, besides giving Daras to him, he was invited to the religion through speech. And now he is recognized as a well-known speaker among Bangla speaking scholars. He also gave regular lectures on Dr. Zakir Naik's Piece TV. He has so far participated in various programs in Saudi Arabia, Dubai, India and the Maldives. The interesting feature of his statement is that he recited the Arabic ebat of Hadith and then translated it. His two-and-a-half thousand hadiths were memorized. He spoke for two or three hours on different subjects, but he did not find any place other than translations of Hadith and Hadith. As a result, each of his statements is one of the Daras Hadith.
He has contributed less than his contribution to the field of writing, so far he has written about ten books. In the meantime, one of the rules is the prayer of the Prophet's Prayer and the Tauzieh al-Quran. Many of his students, who are now in his hand, are now offering the daily sacrifice of the people like Shaikh Muzaffer bin Mohsin, Shaikh Imamuddin bin Abdul Bassi, Shaikh Nurul Islam, Shaikh Abu Taher, Shaikh Abdul Matin Madani, Shaikh Shariful Islam Madani. Besides, there are thousands of people on the verge of Bengal who have repented from all the sins committed by al-Hamdulillah. There are many such young people who, after listening to Shaykh, gave up wearing pants under ankle, and kept the sunnati beard in their mouth. It is to be noted that one of the characteristics of Shaykh's statement is that he gave a special statement to the Muslims regardless of the madhhab and maslak. Especially in regards to Paradise, Hell, Quayamat, ideal family, who have suffered a great loss, etc. Maslak was able to stir the heart of all Muslims irrespective of religion. In order to spread Islamic education in Bangladesh, he established many institutions such as Al-Jamaiatus Salafia, Rupganj Narayanganj, Al Madrasaatus Salafia, Atmal, Bogra, Birkustiya Darul Hadith Salafia Madrasah Bogra. And assist many organizations to move forward. Such as Al-Marqajul Islami As Salafis, Rajshahi and Sallafia Madrasah, Rajshahi.
We do the Dua, Allah blesses Shaikh and gives good light. Amin! Ammun!

data.name: StudentRegulation
data.value: All students will adhere to the rules of Jami'ah. All students of Jama'a'ah will perform Salat in Jama-'at. If there is evidence to take intoxicant or unlawful food, then he will be expelled from Jami'ah. No one can participate in any type of program without the responsibility of the responsible person. No student can be involved in political parties or any other organization. If proven, the authorities will take action according to the law. No student can go to the market without much need. From there to Maghrib, the gate of Jami'ah is open. Then the student will do the necessary work. Besides, if the need to go outside, then the responsible teacher will have to get permission. Each student's 'Jami'ah' card or 'identity card' will be kept in full swing. No student will be able to keep extra money with special money. A 'Student Account' will be open for the students to deposit extra money. No student can be allowed to stay in the hostel of 'Jami'ah', even relatives, known-unknown people without the permission of the responsible person. No student will be able to keep mobile or any electronic device. Use Jami'ah's mobile phone with permission to speak the necessary information. Every student will keep their beds, cells, and environment clean. Water tap, electric bulb and fan will be used with care. No student can use the dress, heater, water heater etc. A student can not stay in the classroom during the classes. No student can do the tuition. Arrange the dish, bowl, etc. to eat. According to the season, arrange a bed sheet.

data.name: StudentResidentialConvention
data.value: Keep your room, bed, clothes and clothes clean and tidy. Without permission, they will not be in each other's room. Do not disturb another student during reading, sleep, eating etc. After 11pm the room lights will be closed. If there is any problem, the hostel will inform the super / class teacher. No student will be able to use or hold mobile phone in Jami'ah. Otherwise necessary action will be taken. With permission from the salam, the office and the teacher will enter the hall. At the appointed time (three o'clock) will take food. After the leave, Jami'ah will go to the office of the Hostel Super office before departure and after arrival at Jami'ah, sign the prescribed item. Without the permission of the authorities, the exterior will not provide shelter to anyone. Residential students will decide the seat arrangement authority. In this case, depending on the decision of the authorities to bring or not to take into consideration the likes and disadvantages of the guardian. If any student's moral character (abusive speech, indecent behavior, bad behavior with the teacher or any other bad habit) deteriorates, he will be expelled from Jami'ah. Try to speak the correct language. Do not use any other student's permission without permission. The children will behave well with adults and the elderly will look younger than the children. The present day will be present. Follow the teacher's orders, advice and instructions. They will always be concerned about their respect and dignity. Writing, reading, bathing, sleeping, sports, and cleaning the clothes will be done in due course. Regular routine will adhere fully. Otherwise necessary action will be taken. If you stay in Jami'ah with the leave, then you have to pay a fine of 100 taka.

data.name: TeacherStudentComitte
data.value: There will be a committee with al-Jami'ah as-Salafiyah students. The responsible teachers will be in charge. Where students will be promoting talent development programs. For example, publication of newspapers and magazines, newspapers and so on. Note that there will be two branches under 'Abana'. Composed of students studying in a Jami'ah. The other is made up of students coming out of Jami'ah. Who are employed at their own work place in different parts of the country.

data.name: VicePrincipal
data.value:
Shaikh Muzaffar is Hadith Teacher, Al-Marqazul islami as-Salafi, and Member of Darul iftaa, Rajshahi. also SPEAKER at PEACE TV BANGLA [page run by student]
Early life and Education: Shaikh Muzaffar was born on 01.01.1985 in a respectablel family in the village Bawsha hedhatipara in the BAGHAA Thana of the RAJSHAHI District, Bangladesh. He passed the Dakhil (2000), Alim (2003) and Fazil (2007) public examinations from Madrasha Education Board. In 2008 he passed the Dawra Hadith from Aladipur Salafia Madrashah, Nawgan. He passed all examinations in the First Division. He also got his B.A (Hons.) and M.A from Rajshahi University, securing First Class position.
Published works: He has written and published as many as 8 valuable books like daeef o jaal hadis borjoner Mulniti, tarabeeh'r Rakat songkha, Eid er Taqbir etc. [1] and some others are still awaiting for publication. His short papers and which that have been published in different Journals and periodicals are more than 250. Along with this, he supervised many research works.

data.name: WeeklyPersonalTraining
data.value: Students will be given personal amendment ceremony after 4th grade every Thursday. There will be an opportunity to give lectures on Bangla, English, Arabic at least twice a month on each subject and accordingly according to this 'Islahul Baiyan' will be formed. Which is mandatory for all students. The subject matter of each language will be determined. 'Islaahul Baiyan' will be arranged 'Abanaye Jami'ah as-Salafiyah' and there will be certain teachers in the review.

data.name: WelcomeDetails
data.value:
As Salamu Alaikum Praise be to Allah alone. Darud and Salam should be distributed to the Prophet (ﷺ). The first commandment of Allah is "read". Welcome to our official web site.
Honorable readers! You are aware that since August 2013, Shaykh Abdur Razzaq bin Yusuf has managed to establish Al-Jami'ah as Salafiyyah for the purpose of preparing algebraic scholars in harmony with the Holy Quran and Chhih Hadeeth as well as modern education. Within a year of the establishment of Jami'ah Salafiyah, with the help of the great God, we have been able to construct residential buildings of three-storeyed students, which have 10 rooms with 18/20 feet below the floor. And 4 rooms of 15/20 feet brick walls have been built for the students. Falilahil Hamd At present, there are 118 students, 10 teachers, four employees and 31 students, 5 teachers and 1 staff in the department of students in this organization. In the first year of his establishment, Jami'ah Salafiah achieved the 100% A Plus success in the closing examination of the 5th grade in 2014. Presently Darshan Bukhari open to everyone in this organization is being held regularly for every month. Falilahil Hamd Current cost: For your reference, it is being informed that at present, the salary and salary of teachers and employees is Rs 1,468,000 per month. And the cost of eating some poor boys, including eight orphans, costs around 60,000 rupees per month. Future plan: It is very important to take some of our work steps for the organization's needs. That's why we want to put things in a hurry, A 1-5-storey residential residential building. The cost of construction of 1st floor is approximately 40 lakhs. 2- Construction of residential building of a 5th floor building with two units. 3- Construction of a 5-storey mosque with nine thousand square feet. The construction of the first floor will cost around one and a half million. 4- Establishment of a quality libraries and laboratories.
Expand your donation arm like this in the past to reach its target educational institution. InshaAllah Allah will give you a better reward.
